body.p: California attorney and clerk. Native of Prussia. Relocated to San Francisco in 1852. Admitted to the California bar in 1860. Attorney in San Francisco. Practiced law with Judge Walter Van Dyke. Clerk of San Francisco County, California, in 1864. Ex-officio clerk for the 12th District Court of California in 1864.

bibl.p: "William Loewy, Veteran Lawyer Dies at San Jose," San Francisco Chronicle (San Francisco, Calif.), August 12, 1918, p. 3; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, California, San Francisco, San Francisco Ward 4, p. 354; KYR-0001-007-0314.
